ConvIntelligenceSignalRule.name: ConvIntelligenceSignalRule
ConvIntelligenceSignalRule.description: Represents a conversation intelligence signal rule.

ActionType.description: Required. Action to take based on the conversation intelligence signal detected during a conversation. Possible values are:

ActionValue.description: Action to perform based on the ActionType specified. If ActionType is set to LaunchFlow, this value is the DeveloperName of the flow to be launched. For example, EmailAlert. For all other ActionType values, donâ€™t set this parameter.

ConversationChannelId.description: Required. ID (ChannelAddressIdentifier) of the Messaging channel or name (InternalName) of the Voice channel.

Criteria.description: Required. Filter logic applied to the rule conditions (subrules). For example, ((1 AND 2) OR 3). The numbers in the formula are derived from the ConvIntelligenceSignalSubrule.Order value plus 1. For example, filter logic (1 AND 2) is calculated by adding the first condition (Order=0) with the second condition (Order=1).

DeveloperName.description: API name of the conversation intelligence signal rule.

IsActive.description: Required. Indicates whether the conversation intelligence signal rule is active (true) or inactive (false). The default value is false.

Label.description: Name of the conversation intelligence signal rule.

ParticipantRole.description: If Service is set to KeywordMatch, this value determines whether the rule applies to utterances made by reps, customers, or both roles. Possible values are:

Service.description: Required. Salesforce- or partner-provided intelligence source. For Salesforce-provided intelligence sources, set this parameter to KeywordMatch. For partner-provided intelligence sources, possible values are: AmazonConnectContactLens

ConvIntelligenceSignalRule.accessRules: an add-on license for Service Cloud Voice for Amazon Connect, Service Cloud Voice for Partner Telephony with Amazon Connect, Service Cloud Voice for Partner Telephony, or Digital Engagement
